QAPair.Question: What is (are) Benign prostate hyperplasia (BPH) - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations provide information on benign prostatic hyperplasia ( prostate enlargement ): American Academy of Family Physician, Family Doctor -- familydoctor.org/condition/benign-prostatic-hyperplasia-bph/ , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/enlargedprostatebph.html , National Association for Continence -- nafc.org/enlarged-prostate/ , National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases -- www.niddk.nih.gov/health-information/urologic-diseases/prostate-problems/prostate-enlargement-benign-prostatic-hyperplasia , Urology Care Foundation -- www.urologyhealth.org/urology-a-z/b/benign-prostatic-hyperplasia-(bph) ,
